author: rcmatthews
msg: Field states are now only applied to the forms with the original object and method, if it has one, instead of to all forms on a page.

author: dkhaywood
msg: adding dependencies to google guice for future work (in metamodel and parent pom); changing surefire plugin config so picks up junit 4.8.1 rather than junit 4.4

author: rcmatthews
msg: Reorganised dependency in InMemeory store so that it always retrieves the persisted objects from the session factory.  This allows the logging wrappers to work for all OSes.
